title: ON PHILOSOPHY
description: Everything is a downstream of philosophy. Even maths , even science. the rate of growth in any field is directly correlated to its philosophy

title: COMPUTATION MIGHT ITSELF BECOME A COMPUTATION PROBLEM
description: A look at why every problem is basically a math problem, and how whoever solves or navigates around the energy bottleneck wins the future.

title: WHY SIMPLE THINGS SCALE
description: The MOAT of a product is directly correlated to its simplicity.
